bases.name: Jolien Wolfsen
bases.twoYearVision: Focusing on Tanzania and the distribution of SD-cards, focusing on Sub-Saharan Bibleless languages when it comes to Oral Bible Translation.

bases.name: Riley Kneedler
bases.focusNations: Ethiopia, Europe, Middle East, Nepal, Africa
bases.languageGroups: We are beginning connection in Ethiopia.
bases.twoYearVision: I just got back from an outreach in Ethiopia and would love to see the people in the local villages have a bible in their language and have others from the community come and get trained and go back to train others.

bases.name: Jungmi Park
bases.twoYearVision: Distributing the bible to every home in Mongolia
bases.startedProject: We started the project in 2019 aming to reach every home in Mongolia with the bible and the project is still on.

bases.name: Tim Gillette
bases.focusNations: Taiwan, China, Myanmar, Vietnam, Cambodia, Indonesia
bases.twoYearVision: Partner with other orgs in training

bases.name: Matthew Thompson
bases.visionRegion: More of the ethnic minorities in Thailand
bases.twoYearVision: Distribution of 75000 Bible in Thailand. We need finances, local church partnership, and Ywam support
bases.startedProject: Sharebibles Thailand (started at our base in 2015)
bases.desiredProjectMaterials: More audio Bibles in more languages.

bases.name: Estela Ferraz
bases.visionRegion: Our vision language would be Italian.
bases.twoYearVision: To reach 30 new towns in Spain with 4500 Bibles. We need 4500 Bibles to accomplish this goal in the Next two years
bases.startedProject: We started distributing Bibles in the town of Extremadura, Spain in 2017, and by now we already distributed 26,000 Bibles

bases.name: James Patrey
bases.twoYearVision: Translating the Taste & See into Bible-less languages
bases.startedProject: Translated T&S into French, starting to have it translated into Atikamekw

bases.name: Ezra Rice
bases.focusNations: Costa Rica, Central América, Middle East

bases.name: Juan Carlos Crespo
bases.languageGroups: Families en general (a bible in every home)
bases.twoYearVision: En our city by the end of 2021 and start in the capital of our state plus Durango (the state next to us). For that we need more volunteers, Bibles and funds.
bases.startedProject: Bible distribution mostly printed bibles, in Mazatlan and towns around.
bases.desiredProjectMaterials: Manuals to know how to read the Bible or understand it better for ppl. That haven't read it before.

bases.name: Julie McLaughlin
bases.twoYearVision: End of year and next year partnering with OCC with engagement and distribution for children in French Polynesia.
bases.startedProject: Flotilla initiative is working on 66 Bibleless languages in Pacific

bases.name: Josh Lake
bases.focusNations: Thailand, Cambodia, Taiwan, India, Nepal, Ukraine
bases.visionRegion: The languages in our target nations and the Pacific
bases.twoYearVision: I would love to have solid relationships formed with Bibleless people groups in these nations, started by Caleb Survey teams, and distribution plans established with our partners for the languages that already have a Bible.

bases.name: Josiah Slabach
bases.focusNations: Cambodia, Taiwan, Ukraine, Thailand and two other East Asian countries

bases.name: Claudia Barragan
bases.twoYearVision: We would like to see the Tripura people have and understand the word of God in their language.
bases.startedProject: For the Kaobrung language in Bangladesh, we would like to distribute more bibles and finish the old testament.

bases.name: Linda Dixon
bases.twoYearVision: Equip Teams with tools for Trauma Healing
bases.projectMaterials: Trauma Healing Institute Materials. They are in over 120 languages.
